sections.heading: Introduction
items: Welcome to Studio ('we,' 'our,' or 'us'). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us in any way.
By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our services.
This policy applies to all information collected through our website, mobile applications, and any related services, sales, marketing, or events (collectively, the 'Services').

subsections.title: Personal Information
subsections.description: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, including:
items: Name and contact information (email address, phone number, mailing address)

subsections.title: Automatically Collected Information
subsections.description: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns:
items: Pages visited and time spent on our website

sections.heading: How We Use Information
sections.description: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
items: Processing transactions and managing client relationships
Communicating with you about projects, services, and updates
Improving our website and services based on user feedback
Personalizing your experience on our website
Marketing our services (with your consent where required)
Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights
Detecting and preventing fraud or security issues

sections.heading: Information Sharing
sections.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers
items.details: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business

items.title: Legal Requirements
items.details: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety

items.title: Business Transfers
items.details: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred

items.title: Consent
items.details: We may share information with your explicit consent for specific purposes

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Employee training on data protection practices
sections.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
sections.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us:
items: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
sections.contact_note: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may limit some website functionality.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.details: Request access to your personal information we hold
Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your personal information
Request transfer of your information to another service
Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances
Object to processing based on legitimate interests
Withdraw consent for processing where applicable

sections.contact_note: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact Us section.

sections.heading: Third-Party Services
sections.description: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or integrate with third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites.

sections.heading: Children's Privacy
content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 16.
If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 16, we will take steps to remove it.

sections.heading: International Data Transfers
content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own.
We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place when transferring data internationally.
safeguards: Standard contractual clauses approved by regulatory authorities
Adequacy decisions by relevant data protection authorities

sections.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Continued use of our services indicates acceptance of the updated policy.
